thread.section_title: The New Yorker A Wyndham Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Worth it
thread.title_full: Worth it - Review of The New Yorker A Wyndham Hotel, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Pad123456
title: Worth it
text:
First of all the gripes ... there were hair in the bathroom ,building work was noisy and blocked view .
This aside was a great hotel , we said about the hair and the staff sent cleaners straight away .
The building work is just building work and can't really be helped , but maybe a discount for the disruption would be fairer than jus expecting guests to put up without knowledge,
Good location . Sizeable room , good water pressure ( we were on top floor )
